citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:44am on 16-
MAY-2023.
This inspector was able to contact the facility representative via telephone, but no-one was physically present at the
facility. The inspectors waited approximately an additional 45 minutes; inspectors left the property at 12:30pm. Optimal
hours for future inspections were discussed, and re-established.
Additional Inspectors:
Colette Kirk El-Amin, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:44am on 16-
MAY-2023. 
 
This inspector was able to contact the facility representative via telephone, but no-one was physically present at the 
facility. The inspectors waited approximately an additional 45 minutes; inspectors left the property at 12:30pm. Optimal 
hours for future inspections were discussed, and re-established. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Colette Kirk El-Amin, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
